#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define s(n) scanf("%lld",&n);
#define ll long long
struct debugger{template<typename T> debugger& operator,(const T& v){cerr<<v<<" ";return *this;}}dbg;
#define db(args...) do {cerr << #args << ": "; dbg,args; cerr << endl;} while(0)
ll N,t,r;
#define MAXN 11111111
long double p;
long double memo[MAXN];
bool done[MAXN];
long double rec(int n)
{
    if(n>N)
        return 0;
    if(done[n])
        return memo[n];
    long double prob=(1.00/pow(n,p));
    done[n]=1;
    if(prob<1e-11)
        return memo[n]=0;
    return memo[n]=(prob)*(1.00+rec(n+t+r))+
    (1.00-(prob))*rec(n+t);
}
int main()
{
    //freopen("in","r",stdin);

    cin>>N>>p>>t>>r;
    N=min(N,(ll)10000000);
    printf("%0.7Lf\n",rec(1));

    return 0;
}
